website_summaries.verdict: A complete package with life-saving capabilities ideal for homes, churches, and small groups.
pros: Comes in a package that includes pads, battery, carrying case, wall cabinet, and user manual
Blinking green lights lets you know it is ready to use
cons: Does not come with pediatric pads

website_summaries.verdict: One of the few automated defibrillators available.
pros: Comes with battery, pads, and carrying case
We love that it comes with a training kit
Easily visible with wall decals and built-in signage
Self-tests daily to ensure it is ready when you need it

customer_reviews.title: customer service
customer_reviews.text: after a year - battery went bad. No problem. I order a new one $123.00. Now it's have more issues and original seller won't warranty it because I purchased from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dead batteries
customer_reviews.text: I ordered at 7 of these at the same time. When they showed up, we got them all set up and ready to put in our tour vehicles and 2 of the batteries are dead. Not impressed. How long have these been sitting on the shelf?? Otherwise, these showed up as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: gonetraveling2003

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was expected. You get what you pay for. The Tennis club I go too has one and it saved three lives in just over a year . . . that's why I bought it. I particularly like the warranty and the blinking green light that shows you every time you look at it that it is ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Martinage

customer_reviews.title: Literature inside package states it might not work
customer_reviews.text: This should be noted that there's an insert inside stating the product may not work. There is/was a lawsuit mentioned. Look it up before you buy. What's the point if you cannot count on it working? Call 911 and learn how to do CPR.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: More people should have these around just in case...
customer_reviews.text: High quality, complete package . An AED is not that expensive compoared to the likelyhood of it saving a life of someone you care about. Required in workplaces is nice. But people who can afford it should think about having them in their homes more often. Quite easy to use without training.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you how easy it is to operate
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these purchased to be installed in one of our church buildings. Thankfully, we have not had to use the first one, and therefore, I can't tell you how easy it is to operate. Previous experience on a similar model bodes well, indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Important Donation
customer_reviews.text: We believe this defibrillator is simple enough for the average person to learn to use if needed. We donated it to our Church and hope it is never required!!
customer_reviews.author: julia kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal for the price. This is the 2nd one we've purchased for a small office of 4 employees (as a safety precaution). Thank goodness we've never had to use it yet (just tested it a few times during our drills).
customer_reviews.author: DSP

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for homes and facilities.  You could save a life unroll 911 arrives
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our home and boat after a friend had a heart attack and later had a heart transplant.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Luckily haven't had to test it but love the kit it comes in, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The Philips HeartStart OnSite AED looks like it will do the job, if it is ever needed.
customer_reviews.text: The Philips HeartStart OnSite AED (with value Package arrived promptly and in good condition. The ulimate test of this device, may never occur, but from what i can see, it not only meets my expectations, it exceeds them! The value package is a worthwhile investment too.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for our church. Compatible and comparable with AEDs ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our church. Compatible and comparable with AEDs used by our local EMS. Thankfully, we have not had the occasion to actually use the device.
customer_reviews.author: George R. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quick shipping and got it up on the wall the day it came in! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas H.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any business or organization
customer_reviews.text: Added a unit to our 5,000 sf venue just in case ! We had a patron pass out earlier in the year and got us thinking about what if. Now we are ready to assist until medics arrive. Unit sets up easy, case is great and the alarm can be set to auto or off if you don't need it. Everything needed is in the package, this is the way to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JParizona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was just what we needed here at Clemson United Methodist Church
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful unit. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful unit. Easy to use. Came packaged very well packed. I would recommend this unit to anyone considering an AED.
customer_reviews.author: kurt kinde

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works as good as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had to use it, and God forbid we ever have to! But so far it has looks nice in our Church hall and gives some peace of mind that we have it if we need it!
customer_reviews.author: Haralambobby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a Condominium Association age 55 plus..... so excited to have this accessible to everyone. Easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggietoo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.....already have one at office
customer_reviews.text: Great price.....bought as an addition for our vacation home. I have been in many situations where....this an help. Easy set-up...and instructional video for family members to learn....hopefully they can save my butt!
customer_reviews.author: David G. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Potential Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: We hope we never need to use it, but glad to have it since my partner has had previous heart issues. Only wished it didn't have the big metal case since we are using it for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sally S.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my church and great price for all you get
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my church and great price for all you get! Always a good AED that is simple to use!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes this had everything to mount it to the wall with signage and all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Exactly as described with all the accessories
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Exactly as described with all the accessories, arrived timely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't know
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it works until I get a heart attack. I'll let you know, if I can.
customer_reviews.author: Aranhas

customer_reviews.title: Cute, reversible doggy carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little carrier for a dog 7 lbs and under. We got it for our 5.5 lb chi and she loves it. It's sturdy, looks good and seems to hold up well after washing. I wish the strap part were adjustable, may not be an easy carry for a man with a larger frame. I am a full figured woman and it's a bit snug, other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Lita doody

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind. We like the green flashing battery indicator
customer_reviews.text: We feel much more at ease now that we have this in the house. The little green beeping light tells us from the outside that the battery is well charged too, which is helpful. Came with a stand that could be mounted too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sandoval

product_meta.title: Philips HeartStart OnSite AED Defibrillator Value Package with Slim Carry Case, AED Wall Sign, Fast Response Kit and AED Wall Mount
product_meta.description: Style:Onsite Value PackageThe Philips HeartStart OnSite AED Defibrillator is designed for the ordinary person in the extraordinary moment. This defibrillator guides you through the process of treating a victim of suspected sudden cardiac arrest. The OnSite AED provides real-time guidance through step-by-step voice commands and CPR guidance. The AED also comes equipped with integrated adult AED SMART pads, which provide feedback to the defibrillator so it can adapt its voice instructions to your pace. To give you confidence in your ability, you also can install a special pads cartridge (sold separately) that temporarily turns your OnSite defibrillator into a trainer.This AED Value Package comes with a Slim AED Carry Case, which can accommodate a pair of paramedic scissors in addition to the defibrillator. The AED Value Package also includes a 9-inch by 6-inch AED Wall Sign to provide greater visibility for your defibrillator, a Fast Response Kit that contains tools and supplies typically needed for patient care and personal protection, and an AED Wall Mount, designed for placing the HeartStart Defibrillator and its accessories within reach.
feature_bullets: AED defibrillator designed for ease of use and prompt response
Step-by-step voice commands and CPR guidance provide real-time guidance
Easily converts to an AED trainer when you attach training pads (sold separately)
Slim AED Carry Case accommodates defibrillator and paramedic scissors
Please contact Philips directly at 1-800-263-3342 with any questions regarding the performance or operation of your HeartStart Products. Returns are permitted for warranty purposes only.

AED ships with: HeartStart OnSite AED Defibrillator, battery, adult SMART pads cartridge, setup and maintenance guides, owner’s manual, quick reference guide, date sticker, Slim Carry Case, AED Wall Sign, Fast Response Kit and AED Wall Mount

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
